Headline: #95 95th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 91st/Burley
ShortDescription: Eastbound 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 92nd and Buffalo: due to street blockage near 91st/Burley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 92nd and Buffalo: due to street blockage near 91st/Burley.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
